Detailed Description

template<unsigned D, typename N = double>
class VecMath::Matrix< D, N >

Matrix<D, N>: a DxD matrix of numbers of type N
Parameters:
D dimension of the matrix
N numerical type of the matrix elements
Author:
Helge Preuss <scout@hyperspace-travel.de>

creates a DxD rotation Matrix, where D=4, not yet implemented

Parameters:
Rxy rotation around xy plane (z axis)
Rxz rotation around xz plane (y axis)
Rxw rotation around xw plane
Ryz rotation around xy plane (x axis)
Ryw rotation around yw plane
Rzw rotation around zw plane

References abort(), and Global::itoa().
